mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule(emp_no, schedule_title, schedule_type, all_day, start_datetime, end_datetime) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleType}, #{allDay}, STR_TO_DATE(#{startDatetime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), STR_TO_DATE(#{endDatetime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET schedule_title = #{scheduleTitle}, schedule_type = #{scheduleType}, all_day = #{allDay}, start_datetime = STR_TO_DATE(#{startDatetime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), end_datetime = STR_TO_DATE(#{endDatetime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}
